Text: The Cheka-OGPU knows that for six months, investigators
finally found those responsible for the collapse
of the underground tunnel of the Big Circle Line;
in March, Vladimir Putin was opened with fanfare
by Mayor Sergei Sobyanin. Four well-known builders
are suspected of criminal negligence - Igor Averin,
general director of Engineering Geology LLC, Ulyana
Korableva Valery Orlovsky - chief geologist engineer
of the company, general contractor of Donstroy,
Turkish developer "friend" of Marat Khusnullin
- Kuru Ramazan. The Cheka-OGPU was the first to
say that the responsibility for the collapse and
flooding of the section of the Michurinsky Prospekt
station and the Aminevskaya station would fall
on the company. The damage caused by the actions
of the ‚Äúconstruction organized crime group‚Äù has
already been calculated ‚Äì 3.5 million rubles.
It took investigators 7 months to reconstruct
the picture of what happened. On March 13, according
to Averin‚Äôs order, a drilling rig was sent to
the site of construction of the ‚ÄúEvent-5‚Äù residential
complex by Lobachevsky by a group of geological
engineers. A Kamaz worker was driven close to
the BKL, while drilling a well, at some point
the concrete ceiling of the underground tunnel
was literally crushed, and a collapse occurred.
To control the execution of work according to
the regulations Igor Averin Ulyana Korableva -
there was a moment of emergency. And the geological
engineer Orlovsky blinked his eyes, the driver
was directing the drill. Interestingly, the work
of the ‚ÄúEvent-5‚Äù residential complex, the construction
is carried out by the well-known Donstroy, Averin
carried out the task of the Turkish ‚Äúfriends‚Äù
of Marat Khusnullin - the contractor company ANTTEQ,
the structure of Ant Yapi - the Turkish developer
who built the ‚ÄúOko‚Äù tower ‚ÄúMoscow City‚Äù. Investigators
found out that the general director of Anttek,
Kuru Ramazan, asked Averin to help drill 5 wells
40 meters deep for soil sampling. ‚ÄúEngineering
Geology‚Äù easily agreed to be a sub-contractor
for the construction, signing the necessary agreement.
Allegedly, Anttek sent the documents and they
managed to review them. It turns out that the
drillers were subject to some legal grounds, additional
claims. Now they want to attract ‚ÄúTurkish friends‚Äù
who allowed ‚Äúoutside‚Äù geologists to the site,
in particular, the criminal offense of Art. 216
is shining for Kura Ramadan.

Text: Anti-migrant raids continue in Russian cities.
A source from the Cheka-OGPU told the preliminary
results of the special operation in Moscow - hundreds
of foreigners were detained, most of them with
fictitious documents supplied by the police. Investigators'
desks are literally overflowing with cases related
to corruption in the ranks of the Ministry of
Internal Affairs. In every metropolitan district,
there were local police officers, operatives,
and entire heads of migration departments, who
legalized money for newcomers. One of the latest
cases - on October 10, the OSB closed the ‚Äúmigration‚Äù
department of the Zyuzino district. The leader,
Captain Matyukhina, was taken in bribes. Over
a whole series of episodes: an employee registered
2-5 thousand Afghans from the CIS in random apartments.
The property owners knew that the square meters'
neighbors were the Hussein Zafarkhans. Matyukhin
received the fictitious money from intermediaries
in her office. Another criminal case: in the Southern
Administrative District, employees of the translation
agency Khachatryan Tskhovbreva, together with
specialists from the migration department of the
Nagorny District, Filatov Mosyakin, created a
whole conveyor of fake registration of guest workers.
Khachatryan Tskhovbrev found Uzbek and Tajik clients,
sent money to their relatives back home, sent
a list of customers‚Äô names to OVM employees and
added a database. Despite recent crackdowns, corruption
cases continue to emerge. It‚Äôs too profitable
a business to quit. In anti-migrant raids, on
average, 170-190 people are detained for a week,
for example, on September 29, 10 6 in the Northern
Autonomous District of Moscow. Approximately 10-20%
of detainees are expelled from the country. The
most common article regarding guest worker curators
is 322.3 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation,
organization of illegal migration. First of all,
iconic places where diasporas live are explored.
At the end of September, they checked the Dubrovka
market and found a clandestine clothing workshop
- 153 people were delivered to the Department
of Internal Affairs, each of whom made an administrative
report. Western Autonomous Okrug - police raided
the Tashkent cafe and 27 citizens of numerous
republics left in a paddy wagon. Many are in the
Russian Federation illegally. After complaints
from residents of Perovo, raids were organized
on hostels on the streets of Plekhanov Green Avenue,
600 people and documents were checked. Sports
clubs, construction sites, mini-markets, catering
establishments, car wash basements are under supervision.
The leader in the number of migrants is the South-East
Administrative District of the Southern Administrative
District. However, the hunting season for migrants
was opened by chance. Inspection raids are carried
out primarily within the framework of the ‚ÄúOctober-December
2023‚Äù call. Representatives of military commissariats
are present during almost raids. All ‚Äúnew‚Äù citizens
of the Russian Federation, in a simplified system,
received passports, military registration, and
hands are delivered by the OVK. For example, the
case of Ostankino - Azerbaijani Abdurakhmanov
received citizenship and wanted to serve. As a
result, I received a fine; the registration specialty
at the military registration and enlistment office
is preparing to go to war. And the source says
there are hundreds of Abdurakhmanovs - the army‚Äôs
requests are still satisfied. And security forces
work carefully with mosques and religious sites.
For example, the prayer house ‚ÄúRassvet‚Äù st. General
Beloborodov has 18 rooms, rented by the community,
allegedly, there were no foreigners or citizens.

Text: Apple demands ‚ÇΩ5 million from Orla marshmallow
manufacturer. The Americans were outraged by the
name Ecoapple and decided that the drawing of
an apple in the logo of the Russian brand was
similar to the sign. Now a woman has lost a seven-year-old
business while helping to treat her sick son.
As Ecoapple founder Lyudmila Saltykova told SHOT,
the idea of ‚Äã‚Äãcreating her own business is a sign
from above. In 2013, I gave birth to a premature
boy, spent four months on oxygen, and received
a terrible diagnosis for a year. The child needed
expensive treatment and massage. The woman asked
to send a sign, in a dream the late father came
and said: ‚ÄúDry the apples.‚Äù Lyudmila‚Äôs grandmother‚Äôs
father spent his life working in an orchard in
the Oryol region and passing on knowledge. She
followed the advice, went to the site, collect
apples to dry, make marshmallows, pastillas and
other healthy sweets. This is how a micro-business
arose. After hard years of work, the Oryol company
is known in the city. Almost the sales money went
towards the treatment of Lyudmila‚Äôs son. A woman
registered a trademark for the name Ecoapple in
2018 - a whole apple with a leaf emoji. According
to the rules, a patent can be challenged within
five years, which has expired. But on the last
day of the five-year plan, digital giant Apple
said no. The California office company filed a
lawsuit: Lyudmila is demanding ‚ÇΩ5 million in compensation
for the whole apple in the logo, the word Apple
in the name. Now a family business that supports
the health of a child is a threat. Lyudmila appeals
to possible authorities, to leave the right to
trademark.üéØ Subscribe SHOT

Text: The Ministry of Health proposed to entrust the
issuance of permits for ‚Äúgender change‚Äù of children
to five organizations in the country. The Ministry
of Health presented a draft resolution, agreeing
to issue permission for the operation of ‚Äúgender
change‚Äù for minors to five medical institutions.
The document was published on the portal of draft
regulatory legal acts. Among the institutions:
- National Medical Research Center (NMRC) of Endocrinology;
- National Medical Research Center for Children's
Health; - National Medical Research Center for
Obstetrics, Gynecology and Perinatology named
after Academician Kulakov; - Russian National
Research Medical University named after Pirogov;
- St. Petersburg State Pediatric medical university.
Permits, documents, are issued by a medical commission
consisting of an obstetrician-gynecologist, geneticist,
pediatric urologist-andrologist, pediatric endocrinologist,
pediatrician, child psychiatrist, medical psychologist.
They decide the issue based on the examination
of the patient, the documents provided indicating
the diagnosis, the results of data research. If
the resolution is adopted, it will come into force
on March 1, 2024. On December 5, 2022, Vladimir
Putin signed a law completely banning the ‚Äúpropaganda‚Äù

Text: The Russian army is conducting a massive assault
on Avdeevka. What happens is important. Analysis
by BBC war correspondent Pavel AksenovAn attempt
by Russian troops to advance in the area of ‚Äã‚Äãthe
Ukrainian city of Avdeevka, which is called an
assault on Russian para-military social networks,
is logical from the point of view of the general
situation on the front. The city is the center
of a large salient, jutting into Russian defenses;
cutting off is a great temptation for the Russian
command. This made it possible to push back the
Donetsk front line. But more important than the
Russian forces to divert the Ukrainian military
areas is the offensive of the Zaporozhye region
in the Bakhmut region. Ukrainian troops have been
holding Avdiivka itself since 2014. The city (or
rather, what remains) is a heavily fortified area.
It is located several kilometers from Donetsk;
pro-Russian formations tried to take the industrial
suburb once. One exacerbation occurred in 2017.
Since the full-scale invasion, the city has been
the site of fierce fighting. During the years
of hostilities, artillery shelling, and aerial
bombing, Avdeevka was severely destroyed, the
city practically lies in ruins, complicating the
assault. Another factor is the presence of a large
plant, a coke plant, which at the same time serves
as a base, a fortified point, and is difficult
to storm. True, Russian troops broke through,
that‚Äôs what we‚Äôre talking about. Russian troops
are trying to storm the city head-on - judging
by the battle sites, they wanted to take the operational
encirclement and hold supply lines under fire.
This made the defense much more difficult. This
is considered a classic tactic for storming a
city - defense capability is highly dependent
on supplies. However, so far, despite reports
from pro-Russian military bloggers, the advance
of Russian troops in Avdiivka is modest. This
fits the outline of the Russian-Ukrainian war
stage. It has finally crossed the positional position,
neither side has such a significant superiority
in force, to make a breakthrough of the front
by exiting the operational space. In the directions
in which Russian troops are trying to attack,
the Russian army muster a strike force large enough
to break through the Ukrainian defenses. The Russian
army has enough strength and resources. Perhaps
it will soon lead to another fading of the front
- you can slowly storm a fortified area if you
have a large supply of artillery shells and a
sufficient number of guns. However, judging by
the reports, the Russian army does not have this
in the area. Read more

corporations. According to Anna Tsivileva, Chairman

work, be given the opportunity to choose, they

Text: The Russian army's advance by Avdeevka was probably

successesüîµ On the fifth day of the Russian army‚Äôs

‚Äúvictorious reports, breakthroughs, defeats.‚Äù

of Russian firepower as the reason for the ‚Äúheavy
losses in long-term battles.‚Äù The Rybar channel,
which is close to the Russian Ministry of Defense,

üó£ ‚ÄúEspecial success in Avdeevka. They lost the

Text: Situation in the Kupyansk direction on October
14. The Russian army continues to put pressure
on the West. For the last two weeks, the Armed
Forces of Ukraine have been actively trying to
snap back, but in the areas of Ivanovka, Sinkovka,
Timovka, Kislovka, Kotlyarovka has not resulted.
Some of the Ukrainian positions have been lost,
the Russian Armed Forces are gradually gaining
a foothold. For now, the Ukrainian Armed Forces
are using small forces - one or two companies.
They are conducting reconnaissance in force, obviously
conserving their strength. Already unsuccessful
attempts to withdraw from the starting positions
problems begin. The main forces of the Ukrainian
army in the area are concentrated at the Zaoskolie
railway station on the left bank of Kupyansk.
It is practically used for its intended purpose,
there are three large factories - the Kupyansky
feed mill, the Kupyansky meat processing plant,
the Kupyansky dairy plant, the Ukrainian army
has equipped barracks warehouses. It is curious
that part of the Ukrainian reinforcements operates
in a new area with a clear coordination plan,
due to which they regularly detect positions.
Apparently, it is connected with the rapid introduction
of battle reserves, which are vital to cover the
holes in the defense. Forces are openly accumulating
at the plants located to the south at the Kupyansk-Sortirovochny
station. As soon as movement is detected in the
area, targeted strikes are carried out in the
surrounding area. After the withdrawal of the
initial positions of the Ukrainian troops, aviation
is actively working together with artillery. FAB-500
glide bombs and LMUR Izdeliye-305 aircraft missiles
are used in large quantities. The initiative is
directed entirely to the Russian side. Despite
the arrival of Ukrainian Armed Forces reinforcements,
the Ukrainian army is making serious attempts
to strengthen the position. Indirectly he says
that the Ukrainian Armed Forces intend to make
another fortress."Military Chronicle"

Text: Editor-in-chief of Regnum news agency, writer,
journalist, member of the Human Rights Council
Marina AkhmedovaThe news that Makarevich (foreign
agent) promised the world the end of the world
in Dubai looked comical, the tragedy of the last
days is accompanied by a new round of the Arab-Israeli
conflict. Firstly, it was assumed that Makarevich,
who had loved his new homeland in his old age,
would sit at home and war would come. Secondly,
support the Jews against the Arabs, while being
in an Arab country. But all sorts of things. On
the other hand, sitting at home, buying tickets
for concerts. Touring is a good reason, the new
homeland is on fire. It seems that the repatriate
is making a feasible contribution to the struggle
of Israel, publishing posts on social networks
in London, Germany and, finally, the United Arab
Emirates. And Makarevich wrote the following:
‚ÄúCivilized humanity (is there still such a thing?)
has time left, put aside leftist toys to understand,
Ukraine Israel will defeat the next time is the
end of the world. And the beginning of darkness.‚Äù
The darkness is approaching. I feel that the world
is being covered with a shadow, the colors are
fading, a Jew, who has the genetic memory of Babi
Yar, speaks of the victory of Ukraine, gives the
connection to the victory of Israel. Ukraine officially
recognized the Nazi SS division "Galicia" as a
political authority. It is a fact. The SS Division
"Galicia" is the officially accepted standard
of Ukrainian political power. This is a fact,
Kyiv denies it. Jews know the butchers of ‚ÄúGalicia‚Äù,
who believed that Jews are slaughter animals.
It is the Jews who raise their voices against
the SS, the heirs of the executed people. And
besides, the ancestors survived, the light was
born, despite the Nazi regime trying to destroy
the nation at its roots, the light completely
defeated the darkness. And he won - at the cost
of millions of lives of Soviet people. Therefore
- the heirs - we are going to give away the achievements
of the world. Yes, the Jews are prosecutors, accusers
of the Ukrainian political power, the godly SS
division "Galicia", such Makarevich, on the contrary,
are trying to weave Israel and Ukraine, two snakes.
And darkness, of course, is close. It is the Jews
who understand that the victory of Ukraine is
the victory of the SS Galicia division. Which
changed the essence. Her victory is the death
of the Jew. It was the Jews who stopped the bombing
of Gaza. Who does Makarevich want to defeat? The
unfortunate civilian population of Palestine,
Hamas militants use it as a human shield, ‚ÄúAzov‚Äù
(recognized as terrorist) by residents of Ukrainian
cities? In a victory for the heir of Babyn Yar?
Is Israel mixing Palestinian bones, meat and blood
with concrete chips, giving concerts in Dubai?
Yes, he wants the victory of genocide! And in
the case of Ukraine, in the case of Israel. Calls
on world governments to put aside ‚Äútoys‚Äù and do
serious things - finish off Gaza, give new weapons
to Ukraine, people are dying in Ukraine, their
former homeland. In the Gaza Strip on Saturday,
according to the local Ministry of Health, 1,799
people have died. Darkness is coming. And stop
the voices of reconciliation. Oh talk people listen.
But they let the darkness in, it‚Äôs painful to
watch the light, they become the harbingers of
the apocalypse. From Dubai." Specially RT"

Text: Summary morning October 14, 2023‚ñ™Ô∏èThe Russian
Armed Forces continue to break through the defenses
of the Avdeevsky fortified area. The artillery

Armed Forces, the Vodyanoy side is attacking from
the south-west, and the Opytny side is attacking
from the south-east. Our troops are fighting in
Berdychi - they reported consolidating the forces
on the outskirts of the village. There is a clear

the Avdeevsky fortified area. Predictably, difficulties
are created by the powerful concrete fortifications
of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The enemy is transferring

conducted artillery shelling. They write from
the shore, the actions of the 8th Guards Artillery

and enemy rear areas. However, the enemy continues
to prepare to cross the Dnieper.‚ñ™Ô∏èOn the Zaporozhye
front, the Armed Forces of Ukraine attempted offensive
actions and achieved success. An interesting element

altitudes in the Rabotino-Novoprokopovka-Verbovoye
area. A possible solution is to assign MANPADS
crews to advanced units.‚ñ™Ô∏èIn the Kupyansky direction,
the Russian Armed Forces are conducting an offensive
on Liman the First. The advance was 1 kilometer,
10 enemy strongholds were occupied. Heavy flamethrower

Sea, the Armed Forces of Ukraine used an underwater
drone to attack the patrol ship "Pavel Derzhavin".

A sympathetic, life-loving guy Kolya, call sign
Torzhok, serves in the Northern Military District
zone of the ‚ÄúMoscow‚Äù battalion in the hot frontline

thoughts - went to the contract. Nikolai told

the unit as a small cat, he grew tall, says Nikolai.

Text: The St. Petersburg publishing house ran into the
territorial integrity of China there, the ancestors
dreamed of it. The St. Petersburg publishing house
"Slovo" ordered China to print the second edition
of the "Library of Russian Travels" of twenty
books in beautiful gift bindings. But the laws
of the PRC censor absolutely printed products
produced in China, produced in foreign languages
‚Äã‚Äãand exclusively sold abroad. So, the Chinese
saw the book with an illustrated map from 1745,
the state border of China is laid out with an
unambiguous dotted line on the Amur River, the
printing of the book was turned back. If anything,
ordering printing from Russian publishing houses
in China is a normal practice, embarrassments
often occur. The fact is that on August 27, the
People's Republic of China approved new national
standards for the design of borders between China
and countries around the world. And on August
28, images of new maps released by the Chinese
state-owned ‚ÄúStandard Map Service‚Äù appeared on
social networks. It turned out that the Chinese
‚Äúbite off‚Äù part of the territories of India and
Russia in a typographical way. Thus, the Great
Ussuri Island of the Amur River, divided by the
PRC by Russia in 2008, is officially completely
designated as Chinese on Chinese maps. What the
Chinese appropriated was reflected in the Russian
press, read a detailed review here. @fontankaspb
